description:
11.125 hqx
Apply a high-quality magnification filter designed for pixel art. This filter
was originally created by Maxim Stepin.

It accepts the following option:

n.description: Set the scaling dimension: 2 for hq2x, 3 for hq3x, and 4 for hq4x.

name: hqx

parameters.description: Set the scaling dimension: 2 for hq2x, 3 for hq3x and 4 for hq4x. Default is 3.
parameters.name: n

source:
11.125 hqx

Apply a high-quality magnification filter designed for pixel art. This filter was originally created by Maxim Stepin.

It accepts the following option:

n

Set the scaling dimension: 2 for hq2x, 3 for hq3x and 4 for hq4x. Default is 3.
